column1: Table 9. Use of weapon, by mental health status of convicted violent State prison and local jail inmates
report title: Mental Health Problems of Prison and Jail Inmates  NCJ 213600
data source: Survey of Inmates in State and Federal Correctional Facilities, 2004; Survey of Inmates in Local Jails, 2002
authors: Doris J. James and Lauren E. Glaze
Table 9. Use of weapon, by mental health status of convicted violent State prison and local jail inmates
Note: Details do not add to total because inmates may have used more than one weapon.
*Other weapons include blunt objects, stun guns, toy guns, or other specified weapons.
